name: ESHA Research
body:
http://www.esha.com

# Projects
* [DOMx](https://github.com/esha/domx/) - Next generation DOM interaction and traversal
* [HTML(.js)](https://nbubna.github.io/HTML/) - Predecessor to DOMx
* [Eventi](https://esha.github.io/Eventi/) - Declarative event handling for browser and server
* [Vista](https://esha.github.io/vista/) - Automatic, route-sensitive element visibility control
* [Case](https://nbubna.github.io/Case/) - String case utility: convert, identify, flip, extend trivially
* [Store2](https://nbubna.github.io/store/) - Superior API and features for localStorage and sessionStorage
* [trigger](https://nbubna.github.io/trigger/) - Predecessor to Eventi
* [grunt-init-vanilla](https://github.com/nbubna/grunt-init-vanilla) - Create "vanilla" javascript project, QUnit tests included
* [API](https://github.com/nbubna/API) - Build clean, friendly interfaces that wrap $.ajax communication with your backend API.
* [Web Services Demo](https://github.com/esha/wsdemo) - Demo application for developers using ESHA's Web Services
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
